file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-12-04-04 - RH AFT CONSOLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL RH AFT CONSOLE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the RH aft console. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-12-04-000-801-A RH AFT CONSOLE - REMOVAL ALL 25-12-04-400-801-A RH AFT CONSOLE - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-12-04 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-04-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. RH AFT CONSOLE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the RH aft console. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-51-01-000-801-A/400 DIGITAL AUDIO PANEL - REMOVAL AMM TASK 23-51-06-000-801-A/400 OBSERVER-AUDIO JACK PANEL - REMOVAL AMM TASK 35-10-00-910-801-A/200 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: THE PERSONS WHO WILL DO THE PROCEDURE MUST OBEY THE SAFETY CONDITIONS GIVEN IN AMM TASK 35-10-00-910-801-A/200. (1) Remove the digital audio panel (9) ( AMM TASK 23-51-01-000-801-A/400). (2) Remove the observer-audio jack panel (14) ( AMM TASK 23-51-06-000-801-A/400). (3) Remove the observer's lifevest (12). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (3 and 4) and washers (2 and 5) that attach the upper forward shroud assembly (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-04 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Turn the regulating valve of the oxygen cylinder to OFF. (3) Depressurize the line through the oxygen mask (7). (4) Loosen the dzus (6). (5) Pull the oxygen-mask stowage-case (8) out. (6) Disconnect the tube (10) and plug (11) of the oxygen mask (7). (7) Remove the oxygen-mask stowage-case (8). (8) Remove the nut (18) and washers (17) that attach the oxygen cylinder hose (16). (9) Loosen the screws (15) that attach the RH aft console (13). (10) Remove the RH aft console (13). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-04 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL RH Aft Console - Removal/Installation Figure 401 REGULATION A VALVE (REF.) 1. UPPER FORWARD SHROUD ASSEMBLY 16. OXYGEN CYLINDER HOSE JAM NUT (REF.) 2. WASHER (2) 3. SCREW (2) B 4. SCREW (4) DET. A 18. NUT 5. WASHER (4) DET. C 6. DZUS FASTENER 7. OXYGEN-MASK 8. OXYGEN-MASK STOWAGE-CASE 17. WASHERS 9. DIGITAL AUDIO PANEL 10. TUBE 11. PLUG C 12. OBSERVER’S LIFEVEST DET. B 13. RH AFT CONSOLE 14. OBSERVER-AUDIO 15. SCREW EM145AMM250235B.DGN JACK PANEL EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-12-04 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-12-04-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. RH AFT CONSOLE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the RH aft console. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-51-01-400-801-A/400 DIGITAL AUDIO PANEL - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 23-51-06-400-801-A/400 OBSERVER-AUDIO JACK PANEL - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the RH aft console (13) in the installation position. (2) Install the RH aft console (13) with the screws (15). (3) Put the oxygen cylinder hose (16) in its installation position. (4) Attach it with the washers (17) and nut (18). (5) Connect the tube (10) and plug (11) of the oxygen mask (7). (6) Put the oxygen-mask stowage-case (8) in the installation position. (7) Install the oxygen-mask stowage-case (8) with the dzus (6). (8) Turn the regulating valve of the oxygen cylinder to ON. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-12-04 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (9) Install the upper forward shroud assembly (1) with the screws (3 and 4) and washers (2 and 5). J. Follow-on (Figure 401) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the digital audio panel (9) ( AMM TASK 23-51-01-400-801-A/400). (2) Install the observer-audio jack panel (14) ( AMM TASK 23-51-06-400-801-A/400). (3) Put the observer's lifevest (12) at the right position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-12-04 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
